title: Fake Ledger Live app in Microsoft Store steals $768,000 in crypto
description: Microsoft has recently removed from its store a fraudulent Ledger Live app for cryptocurrency management after multiple users lost at least $768,000 worth of cryptocurrency assets. [...]

title: BlueNoroff hackers backdoor Macs with new ObjCShellz malware
description: The North Korean-backed BlueNorOff threat group targets Apple customers with new macOS malware tracked as ObjCShellz that can open remote shells on compromised devices. [...]

title: Microsoft: Some Outlook.com users can't send emails with attachments
description: In a Monday advisory, Microsoft warned Outlook.com users about issues they might encounter when sending emails containing attachments. [...]

title: Microsoft Authenticator now blocks suspicious MFA alerts by default
description: Microsoft has introduced a new protective feature in the Authenticator app to block notifications that appear suspicious based on specific checks performed during the account login stage. [...]

title: OpenAI confirms it's not killing off ChatGPT plugins for now
description: During its inaugural developer conference, OpenAI unveiled GPTs, short for Generative Pre-trained Transformers. These custom versions of ChatGPT are designed to be shaped by and for individual users, whether for recreational or professional use, and can be shared with others. [...]

title: Marina Bay Sands discloses data breach impacting 665,000 customers
description: The Marina Bay Sands (MBS) luxury resort and casino in Singapore has disclosed a data breach that impacts personal data of 665,000 customers. [...]
